startText:
üá∫üáø: Assalomu alaykum, iltimos bot tilni tanlang.

üá∑üá∫: –ó–¥—Ä–∞–≤—Å—Ç–≤—É–π—Ç–µ, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, –≤—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ —è–∑—ã–∫.

üá¨üáß: Hello, please select a language.
startTextUz: Xush kelibsiz! üëã üìä Xisobchi.ai ‚Äì bu shaxsiy moliyalaringizni avtomatik boshqaruvchi AI yordamchi. üí° Nimalar qila oladi?: - Kirim-chiqimlaringizni tahlil qiladi üìä - Xarajatlaringizni toifalarga ajratadi üè∑ - Moliyaviy intizomni shakllantirishga yordam beradi ‚úÖ ‚è© Davom etish uchun pastdagi tugma orqali telefon raqamingizni yuboring. va bu bilan Ofertamiz shartlariga rozilik bildirasiz
startTextEng: Welcome! üëã üìä Xisobchi.ai is an AI assistant that automatically manages your personal finances. üí° What can it do?: - Analyzes your income and expenses üìä - Categorizes your expenses üè∑ - Helps you build financial discipline ‚úÖ ‚è© To continue, send your phone number using the button below.
startText2Eng: By continuing, you agree to the terms and conditions.
askNameTextUz: Ajoyib, endi tanishib olamiz, ismingiz nima ?
askNameTextEng: Great, now we can get to know each other, what is your name?
contactRegisterErrorUz: Noto'g'ri, davom etish uchun aynan pastdagi tugma orqali kontaktingizni yuboring..
contactRegisterErrorEng: Wrong, please send your contact via the button below to continue.
successfullyRegisterUz: ‚úÖ Ro'yxatdan o'tib, tanishib ham oldik. Ming marta eshitgandan bir marta ishlatib ko‚Äôrgan afzal. Keling xisobchi.ai dan foydalanib ko‚Äôramiz
successfullyRegisterEng: ‚úÖ We registered and got to know each other. It's better to try once than hear a thousand times. Let's try using xisobchi.ai
test1TextUz:
Ushbu xabarni shu yerga audio ko‚Äôrinishida yuboring:

‚ÄùTaksiga 15,000 so‚Äôm xarajat qildim‚Äù
test1TextEng:
Send this message here in audio format:

‚ÄùI spent 15,000 sum on a taxi‚Äù
test2TextUz:
Ajoyib, keyingi qadam sifatida bu xabarni shu yerga audio, istasangiz matn ko‚Äôrinishida yuboring:

‚Äù50,000 so‚Äômga ovqatlandim‚Äù
test2TextEng:
Great, as a next step, send this message here in audio, or text if you prefer:

‚ÄùI ate for 50,000 sums‚Äù
test3TextUz: Keyingi qadam, qarzlarni nazorat qilish. Quyidagi matnni audio yoki matn ko‚Äôrinishida yuborib ko'ring. Rustamga 500 000 so'm qarzga berdim. 15-avgustda qaytaradi.
test3TextEng: The next step is to control debts. Try sending the following text as audio or text. I lent Rustam 500,000 soums. He will return it on August 15th.
firstTextPaymentUz: Quyida Xisobchi.ai tariflari bilan tanishib, o'zingizga mosini tanlab - xarajatlaringizni boshqarishni boshlashingiz mumkin üè∑Agar hali ishonchingiz komil bo'lmasa, 3 kunlik bepul sinov muddatidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
firstTextPaymentEng: Below you can familiarize yourself with the tariffs of Xisobchi.ai, choose the one that suits you and start managing your expenses. üè∑AIf you're still not sure, you can take advantage of the 3-day free trial.
menuTextUz: Asosiy sahifa: Kirim-chiqimingizni shu yerda istalgan shaklda, matn yoki ovozli holatda yuborsangiz, men xisob kitoblarga qo'shib qo'yaman üìä
menuTextEng: Home: Send your input here in any form, text or audio, and I'll add a report. üìä
limitTextUz: Bu yerda siz xarajatlaringizga limit o‚Äôrnatishingiz mumkin. Xarajatlaringiz siz belgilagan limitga yaqinlashsa, men sizga xabar beraman. Bu yerga limitni raqamlarda yuboring: Masalan: 5 000 000
limitTextEng: Here you can set a limit on your spending. I will notify you when your spending gets close to the limit you set. Send the limit in numbers here: For example: 5 000 000
limitText2Uz: Bu yerda siz xarajatlaringizga limit o‚Äôrnatishingiz mumkin. Xarajatlaringiz siz belgilagan limitga yaqinlashsa, men sizga xabar beraman. Sizning hozirgi limitingiz: %limit% ‚Ä®Bu yerga limitni raqamlarda yuboring: Masalan: 5 000 000
limitText2Eng: Here you can set a limit on your spending. I will notify you when your spending approaches the limit you set. Your current limit: %limit% Send the limit here in numbers: For example: 5 000 000
limitText3Uz: Ajoyib, limit o‚Äôrnatildi, yangilah uchun shu yerga yangi limitingizni yuboring.
limitText3Eng: Great, the limit has been set, send your new limit here for updates.
premiumTextUz: üíé O'zingizga mos tarifni tanlang va Xisobchi AI dan bahramand bo'ling.
premiumTextEng: üíé Choose a tariff that suits you and enjoy Xisobchi AI.
premiumText2Uz: Siz o‚Äôz moliyaviy intizomingizga investitsiya qilgansiz va Xisobchi AI‚Äô premium obunasiga egasiz. Obuna tugash vaqti: %expiredDate%
premiumText2Eng: You have invested in your financial discipline and have a premium subscription to Xisobchi AI. Next subscription renewal time: %expiredDate%
premiumExpiredTextEng: The expiry date of your Premium' tariff:
askStopSubscribeUz:
Haqiqatdan ham obunani to‚Äôxtatmoqchimisiz ?

Obunani qayta tiklagungizga qadar xisobotlaringizni ko‚Äôra olmaysiz va Xisobchi AI dan foydalana olymaysiz.
askStopSubscribeEng:
Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?

You will not be able to view your reports or use Xisobchi AI until you renew your subscription.
premiumDurationTextUz: Siz o‚Äôz moliyaviy intizomingizga investitsiya qilgansiz va Xisobchi AI‚Äô premium obunasiga egasiz. Keyingi obuna yangilanish vaqti: %expiredDate% Bu yerda obunani va kartalaringizni boshqarishingiz mumkin
premiumDurationTextEng: You have invested in your financial discipline and have a premium subscription to Xisobchi AI. Next subscription renewal time: %expiredDate% Here you can manage your subscription and cards,
addCardTextUz: Obunani faollashtirish uchun karta qo'shishingiz lozim.
addCardTextEng: You must add a card to activate your subscription.
priceTextUz: Siz %title% tarifni tanladingiz. Tarif narxi atiga %price% ni tashkil qiladi. Endi o‚Äôzingizga qulay turda to'lovni amalga oshiring:
priceTextEng: You have selected the tariff %title%. The tariff price is at least %price%. Now make a payment in a convenient way for you:
successfullyPaidUz: ‚úÖ To‚Äôlovingiz muvaffaqiyatli amalga oshdi. Kirim va chiqimlaringizni istalgan ko'rinishda (ovoz, matn) yuborishni boshlashingiz mumkin, yordamchingiz esa yozib boraveradi.
successfullyPaidEng: ‚úÖ Your payment has been successful. You can start sending your receipts and expenses in any format (voice, text), and your assistant will continue to record them.
cronTextBefore2dayUz: Premium obunangiz tugashiga 2 kun qoldi, davom ettirish uchun tarif to'lovini amalga oshirishingiz lozim
cronTextBefore2dayEng: Your premium subscription has 2 days left to expire, you must pay the tariff to continue
cronTextBefore1dayUz: Premium obunangiz tugashiga 1 kun qoldi, davom ettirish uchun tarif to'lovini amalga oshirishingiz lozim, aks holda botdan foydalana olmaysiz.
cronTextBefore1dayEng: There is 1 day left before your premium subscription expires. To continue, you must pay the tariff, otherwise you will not be able to use the bot.
cronTextStopedUz: Sizning premium obunaningiz tugadi. Botdan foydalanish uchun, kerakli tarifni tanlab, to'lovni amalga oshiring.
cronTextStopedEng: Your premium subscription has expired. To use the bot, select the desired plan and make a payment.
cronTextMorningPremiumUz:
Assalomu alaykum. Kuningiz xisobli o'tsin!

Xarajatlaringizni yuritishni unutmang (emoji)
cronTextMorningPremiumEng:
Good morning. Have a great day!

Don't forget to keep track of your expenses (emoji)
cronTextAfternoonPremiumUz:
Xisobchi.ai aloqada. Ertalabdan hozirgacha bo'lgan xisobingizni kiritdlingizmi? 

Esingizdan chiqmasidan yuborib qo‚Äôying. Bunga shunchaki 30 soniya yetarti
cronTextAfternoonPremiumEng:
Xisobchi.ai is in touch. Have you entered your account from this morning to now? 

Send it before you forget. It only takes 30 seconds.
cronTextNightPremiumUz:
Bugun sarxisobi:

Xarajatlar: %output% so'm
Kirimlar: %income% so'm

Limitingiz bo‚Äôyicha qoldiq: %limit% so'm
cronTextNightPremiumEng:
Today's summary:

Expenses: %output% soums
Incomes: %income% soums

Balance under your limit: %limit% soums
cronText2NightPremiumUz:
Bugun sarxisobi:

Xarajatlar: %output% so'm
Kirimlar: %income% so'm
cronText2NightPremiumEng:
Today's summary:

Expenses: %output% soums
Incomes: %income% soumslimitBtnUz
cronTextRegister1dayUz:
Oylik sarfingizni aniq nazorat qilib, ortiqcha xarajatlarni 20% gacha kamaytirish imkoniga ega bo‚Äôling. Xisobchi AI bilan har kun moliyangizni tushunarli grafiklarda ko'ring va har bir tiyiningizni e'tiborsiz qoldirmang.

Obuna narxi atigi %price% so'm = bir dona lavash...

Xarajatlaringizni nazoratga oling va moliyaviy mustaqil boling.
cronTextRegister1dayEng:
Get a clear view of your monthly expenses and reduce your excess expenses by up to 20%. With Calculator AI, see your finances in easy-to-understand graphs every day and don't neglect every penny.

The subscription price is only %price% soum = one lavash...

Take control of your expenses and become financially independent.
cronTextRegister2dayUz:
Pul qaerga ketayotganini bilmay qolasizmi? Ko‚Äòpimiz shunday muammoga duch kelamiz.
Xisobchi AI bilan audio orqali harajat yoki daromadingizni bir zumda kiritib, to‚Äòliq nazorat o‚Äòrnating.

Oylik %price% so'mga bugunoq obuna bo‚Äòling ‚Äì bu sizning eng yaxshi sarmoyangiz bo‚Äòladi!
cronTextRegister2dayEng:
Do you ever wonder where your money is going? Many of us face this problem.
Take full control by instantly entering your expenses or income via audio with Xisobchi AI.

Subscribe today for %price% soums per month - it will be your best investment!
cronTextRegister3dayUz:
%price% so'm...

Sizni moliyaviy erkinligingizni nazorat qilish uchun kerak investitsiya.

Keling bugun shu %price% so'mni yana qayerga "shunchaki" sarflab yuborish mumkinligini ko'rib chiqamiz.

1. Bir stakan yaxshi kofe. Yo'q, eng zo'r kofe emas. Shunchaki oddiy cappucino. Sovugan bo'lsa 5 daqiqada, issiq bo'lsa 10 daqiqada ichib tugatasiz. Hayotingiz o'zgaradimi?

Agar kechasi ichgan bo'lsangiz Ha, ertalabgacha uxlolmay. Ertangi kuningiz ham yomon o'tadi.

Moliyaviy tomondan esa plyusda emassiz))
cronTextRegister3dayEng:
%price% sum...

You need an investment to take control of your financial freedom.

Let's see where else you can "just" spend this %price% soum today.

1. A cup of good coffee. No, not the best coffee. Just an ordinary cappuccino. If it's cold, you'll finish it in 5 minutes, if it's hot, you'll finish it in 10 minutes. Will your life change?

If you drank it at night, yes, you won't be able to sleep until morning. Your day tomorrow will be bad too.

And you're not in a plus financially))
cronTextRegister4dayUz:
Keling bugun shu %price% so'mni yana qayerga "shunchaki" sarflab yuborish mumkinligini ko'rib chiqamiz.

Hech qishki kiyimingizni cho'ntagidan pul topib olganmisiz?

%price% dan ko'p bo'lganmi?

Yana nimani o'ylayabsiz, hayotingizni yaxshilashga harakat qilib ko'rish uchun %price% katta summami?

Qo'ysangiz-chi))
cronTextRegister4dayEng:
Let's see where else you can "just" spend this %price% soum today.

Have you ever found money in your pocket for your winter clothes?

Has it been more than %price%?

What else do you think, is %price% a big amount to try to improve your life?

What if you give it away))
cronTextRegister5dayUz:
Keling bugun shu %price% so'mni yana qayerga "shunchaki" sarflab yuborish mumkinligini ko'rib chiqamiz.

Chilonzordan Oybekgacha taskida yetib olishga qancha sarflaysiz?

%price% dan kammi? Yomg'ir bo'lsachi?)

Taksi qimmat bo'ladi, siz ko'p pul yo'qotasiz-a?

Kirim-chiqimlaringizni nazorat qilmayotganingiz sizga qanchaga tushayotganini-chi bilasizmi?

Oyiga qancha pulni shunchaki ishlatib yuborayotganingizni-chi?

Siz bo'lsa bitta lavashni pulini tejayman deb, moliyaviy erkinligingizni ortga surayabsiz..
cronTextRegister5dayEng:
Let's see where else you can "just" spend this %price% soum today.

How much will it cost you to get from Chilonzor to Oybek by taxi?

Is it less than %price%? What if it rains?)

A taxi is expensive, and you lose a lot of money, right?

Do you know how much it costs you not to control your income and expenses?

How much money do you just waste every month?

You are postponing your financial freedom, thinking that you will save money on one lavash..
